Fixed DOS encoding problem (DG); * 07-Nov-2001 : Updated header (DG); * 09-Oct-2002 : Fixed errors reported by Checkstyle (DG); * 14-Oct-2002 : Now extends EventListener (DG); * */
/** * The interface that must be supported by classes that wish to receive * notification of changes to a plot. * */
